page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content:
This introduces the Dblock that lies to the north of{Kingsbridge}and south of the village of{Loddiswell}in South Devon.
The land,mainly agricultural in use,is typical hill and valley kind and is criss-crossed by a network of roads that all connect Kingsbridge to its larger and smaller neighbours.It is a land of small Devon farms nestling in wooded coombes with the occaisonal surviving remenants of Manor Houses and their estates.
It has probably changed little over the centuries.The wooded hills are fields,the population is smaller and the trains have visited and gone.The 19th Century stirred it briefly but for now it is quiet,peaceful and heartland South Devon.
